name: Long John's Space Adventure
description:
You wake up in an unfamiliar place. It feels like everything is floating. Where are you?

Oh, that’s right. You’re in space.

All of your stuff seems to be missing. You should probably cruise around to collect it. But don't be too greedy. There is only so much smell one pilot can take.

Pick up the right crates by using the radar to navigate to green markers. Avoid red ones. Navigate through the end.

Created for Finnish Game Jam 2021 Ylivieska

  • Code: Ari, Juhana, Markus 
  • Art: Maiju, Tapio
  • Audio & Music: Joel
  • Design: Everyone
